data.actual_result: Role list will not show until you scroll up/down.
data.expected_result: List of roles shows up with no problem
data.short_description: After creating a role with a very long name, the role list will not show until you swipe up/down.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new role. - Name the role something ridiculously long or with lots of W's. - Exit the role settings page.
